ingredients: tablespoon of apple cider vinegar (or lemon juice)
instructions: Crumbly crust: sift the flour, cocoa, and sugar, then add salt.
Add the butter and chop the mixture with a knife until small crumbs form.
Add water and vinegar and quickly knead the dough.
Line a tart or cake pan with the dough, prick it with a fork, and put it in the freezer for 15 minutes.
Place baking paper on the tart, add some weights (for example, beans), and bake at 180 degrees Celsius for 15-20 minutes - remove the weights for the last 5 minutes.
Allow the crust to cool
